Catalogue.Tax: To this amount will be added any payment tax that your country has with respect to your local currency.

Payment.Title: Payment Methods
Payment.details: We will detail the available payment methods:
Payment.cardsDetails: We accept all credit cards and debit cards!
Payment.WalletDetails: We accept Paypal / Mercado pago as money in account and all associated means.
Payment.WireDetails: We accept bank transfers in pesos or dollars made on the same day of purchase. The account data is sent at the end of the purchase by email. We verify the accreditation within 24 hours.
Payment.InvoiceDetails: We can issue type C invoice.

Shipping.Title: Shipping Methods
Shipping.details: We will detail the available shipping methods:

Error404.pageReason: Some of the reasons why you are seeing this page are:
Error404.pageRemove: The page has been removed and other pages still link to it
Error404.pageServer: The server may be experiencing technical difficulties
Error404.pageTypo: You have entered an incorrect address in your search bar
